pages.text: saying: are you among those confirming (the resurrection and the judgment)
Would we indeed be judged when we die and become dust and bones
He said: do you know (him)
So he looked and saw him in middle of the hellfire
He said: by God, you almost ruined me
and if it was not for my Masterâ€™s favor, I would have certainly been of those who are brought (to hell)
and are we not to die (again)
except our first death, and we are not punished
Indeed this is the great victory
For (something) like this, the doers should do (good deeds)
Is this a better entertainment or the Zaqqum tree
Indeed We made it a suffering for the wrongdoers
It is a tree that comes out from bottom of the hellfire
Its sprout is like heads of the devils
And they certainly eat from it and fill their stomachs from it
Then indeed they have a mixture of boiling water (to drink) over it
Then their return is certainly to the hellfire
Indeed they found their fathers lost (from the right path)
and yet they rushed on their footsteps
And most of the earlier ones have certainly lost (the right path) before them
And We have certainly sent warners among them
So see what the end of those who were warned was
except God's devoted servants
And Noah has certainly called Us, and We are certainly best of the responders
And We saved him and his family from the great distress
